entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
